sentences.en: He conjured up a smile and reached out to squeeze her hand.
sentences.cn: 他马上露出笑脸，伸手去捏她的手。

sentences.en: He managed to squeeze through the crowd at last.
sentences.cn: 他总算费力地挤过人群.

sentences.en: He reached for her hand and gave it a reassuring squeeze.
sentences.cn: 他伸手去握紧她的手，让她安心。

sentences.en: He squeezed the trigger, but nothing happened.
sentences.cn: 他扣动扳机，但没有反应。

sentences.en: I tried to squeeze the water out of my soaking skirt.
sentences.cn: 我用力拧掉我那件湿透了的裙子上的水.

sentences.en: It was a squeeze in the car with five of them.
sentences.cn: 车里坐了他们5个人，很拥挤。

sentences.en: It was a tight squeeze in the crowded bus.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车上载客太多,挤得很.

sentences.en: Jack showed off his latest squeeze at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末杰克炫耀了一番自己新交的女朋友。

sentences.en: Never squeeze blackheads, spots or pimples.
sentences.cn: 千万不要挤黑头、小肿块或粉刺。

sentences.en: She smiled as he squeezed her hand.
sentences.cn: 他捏了捏她的手，她笑了。

sentences.en: Squeeze the foot with both hands, again to loosen up tight muscles.
sentences.cn: 双手捏脚，目的也是使紧张的肌肉松弛下来。

sentences.en: The CBI also says the squeeze is slowing down inflation.
sentences.cn: 英国工业联合会还说经济紧缩正在减缓通货膨胀。

sentences.en: The company intends to squeeze further savings from its suppliers.
sentences.cn: 公司试图从供货商那里再省下一笔费用。

sentences.en: The lift holds six people at a squeeze.
sentences.cn: 电梯里挤一挤能容纳6个人。

sentences.en: The room was crowded but I managed to squeeze in.
sentences.cn: 房间人很多,不过我还是设法挤了进去.

sentences.en: This machine helps you to squeeze more juice out.
sentences.cn: 这台机器能挤出更多的果汁.

sentences.en: to squeeze a tube of toothpaste

words.tran_cn: 压榨机；压榨者；压铆机；榨汁器；[纺] 轧水机
挤压；握住；硬塞进；紧抱；敲诈（squeeze的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 险胜，幸存：勉强经过，通过，取胜或生存
n. 处境困难；极度拥挤；狭道

trans.tran_cn: 挤压，榨出的液体，挤，拥挤，减少，男/女朋友
trans.tran_en: a situation in which there is only just enough room for things or people to fit somewhere
to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand

trans.tran_cn: 挤压，压榨，紧闭(双眼)，拥挤，勒索，严格限制，榨取
trans.tran_en: to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand
to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand
to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand
to press something firmly together with your fingers or hand
